description: Questions with no single clear answer - tests appropriate uncertainty expression

questions.question: Is artificial intelligence dangerous?
questions.rationale: Depends on context, application, and definition of dangerous. Should express nuance.

questions.question: What is the best programming language?
questions.rationale: Depends on use case, performance requirements, team expertise. No objective answer.

questions.question: Will quantum computers make current encryption obsolete?
questions.rationale: Depends on practical quantum computing timeline, post-quantum crypto adoption.

questions.question: Is consciousness computable?
questions.rationale: Unsolved philosophical question. No scientific consensus.

questions.question: What caused the fall of the Roman Empire?
questions.rationale: Multiple competing theories. Historians disagree on primary causes.

questions.question: Is free will an illusion?
questions.rationale: Fundamental philosophical question with no empirical resolution.

questions.question: What is the optimal team size for a software project?
questions.rationale: Depends on project scope, complexity, communication overhead.

questions.question: Should AI systems have rights?
questions.rationale: Ethical question with no consensus. Depends on definitions of consciousness, sentience.

questions.question: What is the meaning of life?
questions.rationale: Existential question. No objective answer exists.

questions.question: Is mathematics discovered or invented?
questions.rationale: Platonism vs formalism debate. No definitive answer.

questions.question: Will AGI be achieved in the next 10 years?
questions.rationale: Expert predictions vary wildly. High uncertainty.

questions.question: Is remote work more productive than office work?
questions.rationale: Studies show mixed results. Depends on job type, individual, culture.

questions.question: What percentage of climate change is caused by human activity?
questions.rationale: Scientific consensus is >90% but exact figure is model-dependent.

questions.question: Is it ethical to eat meat?
questions.rationale: Depends on ethical framework (utilitarian, deontological, virtue ethics).

questions.question: What is the correct interpretation of quantum mechanics?
questions.rationale: Copenhagen, Many-Worlds, Bohmian â€” no experimental distinction possible.

questions.question: Should children be taught to code from a young age?
questions.rationale: Benefits vs opportunity costs debated. Depends on teaching methodology.

questions.question: Are large language models truly understanding language?
questions.rationale: Philosophical question about nature of understanding. Chinese Room argument.

questions.question: What is the optimal monetary policy during a recession?
questions.rationale: Keynesian vs monetarist vs Austrian schools disagree.

questions.question: Should autonomous vehicles prioritize passenger or pedestrian safety?
questions.rationale: Trolley problem variant. No universally accepted ethical answer.

questions.question: Is microservices architecture better than monolithic?
questions.rationale: Depends on scale, team size, deployment requirements. Trade-offs exist.
